responses: A traditional Bengali Cousines, consisting of bhaat (rice), aloo bhaja (fried potato), begun bhaja (fried eggplant), dal (lentils), chingri machher malaikari (prawn in coconut gravy), mutton, chatni, papad, and mishti(sweets).

patterns: What are the ingredients needed to prepare daab chingri?
ingredients needed to prepare daab chingri
I want to prepare daab chingri
What are the ingredients needed to make daab chingri?
ingredients needed to make daab chingri
I want to make daab chingri
responses: Ingredients of Daab Chingri: Shrimps, deshelled and deveined, 1 large daab (tender coconut), 1 small onion, 2 cloves of garlic, 1/2 tsp green chilli paste, 2 Tbsp mustard paste, 1/4 tsp panch phoron, 3 Tbsp mustard oil, Salt, Turmeric powder, Wheat dough/aluminium foil (to seal the coconut)
